page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT_non service
page.content:
The largest employer in our block is Roseheyworth Colliery.This pit is linked underground with Cwmtillery Pit and employs about 500 men. There were five collieries in the block but this is the only surviver.
To aid the unemployment caused by pit closures several new factories have been opened on reclaimed land in Cwmtillery.These factories make furniture,process frozen food and manufacture tiles.
Beside these there is only one large employer and this is a clothing factory,which is situated in the old Blaina Secondary School,and employs mostly female labour.
Besides these employment is in the service industries.
